text:
New Discoveries

Two friends in a cozy café, discussing articles.  
Raskolnikov looks surprised.  
Raskolnikov: “You wouldn’t have supposed it, eh?”  
Razumihin: “All these questions about crime remind me of your article.”  

---  

Same café, Raskolnikov is astonished.  
Raskolnikov: “My article? In the Periodical Review?”  
Razumihin: “Yes! It came out two months ago!”  
Raskolnikov: “I had no idea!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov discovers that an article he wrote was published in a different review than he expected, highlighting his isolation from the world around him.
